name: Alchemist's Supplies
utilize: Identify a substance (DC 5)
Start a fire (DC 5)
Create a 15ft radius cloud of obscuring smoke (DC 20)
description: Tools used for the practice of alchemy.

name: Brewer's Supplies
utilize: Detect poisoned drink (DC 10)
Identify alcohol (DC 5)
craft: Wine/Mead - (Advantage on saves against being frightened)
Ale/Beer - (Advantage on Charisma skill checks while speaking to someone under the effect of alcohol)
Spirits - (Temporarily reduce the level of exhaustion by 1)
description: Tools and equipment necessary for brewing beverages. Effects of consuming alcohol last 1 hour and always reduce AC by 1.

name: Calligrapher's Supplies
utilize: Write text that guards against forgery (DC 10)
Mimic 10 or fewer words of someone else's handwriting (DC 10)
Duplicate a wax seal (DC 10)
craft: Prepare special inks that fade or become visible only under heat or specified condition
description: Implements used for fine writing and illumination, as well as forgeries of documents.

name: Carpenter's Tools
utilize: Seal or pry open a door or container (DC 10)
Reinforce a wooden structure, granting it resistance to all damage (DC 10).
Fashion a makeshift splint to stabilize a broken limb (DC 10)
Identify weak point(s) in a wooden structure (DC 10)
description: Tools for working with wood.

name: Cartographer's Tools
utilize: Draft a map of a small area (DC 5)
Analyze existing map to deduce a hidden route or feature (DC 15)
Identify current location and directional orientation using a map (DC 10)
Recollect geographical location of foreign landmark or land (DC 10)
description: Instruments for creating maps and charts.

name: Cook's Utensils
utilize: Improve food’s flavor, granting advantage on Wisdom Perception checks for 1 hour (DC 10)
Detect spoiled or poisoned food (DC 10)
description: Implements for preparing and cooking food.

name: Jeweler's Tools
utilize: Discern a gem’s value (DC 10)
Temporarily enhance a magic item, granting the wielder advantage on a saving throw of your choice for 1 hour. (DC 15)
Carefully clean and polish gemstones to increase their perceived value for trade by 50%. (DC 15)
craft: A setting for a specific gem
description: Tools for crafting and appraising jewelry.

name: Leatherworker's Tools
utilize: Determine toughness of an animal's hide (DC 5)
Add a design to a leather item (DC 10)
description: Tools for working with leather.

name: Mason's Tools
utilize: Chisel a symbol or hole in stone (DC 10)
Identify weak points in stone structures (DC 10)
description: Tools for shaping and working with stone.

name: Painter's Supplies
utilize: Paint a recognizable image of something you've seen (DC 10)
Create a convincing forgery of a painting or symbol (DC 15)
Mix pigments that glow faintly in the dark for 1 hour (DC 5)
Camouflage for one creature's equipment (for a particular environment)
description: Materials and tools for painting.

name: Smith's Tools
utilize: Pry open a door or container (DC 10)
Weld up to 5ft of metal (DC 10) (DC 20 Strength check to break)
Identify any flaws or weaknesses in metalwork
description: Tools for working with metal.

name: Tinker's Tools
utilize: Assemble a Tiny item composed of scrap, which falls apart in 1 minute (DC 20)
Disable a simple mechanical device (DC-10)
Create a noise of your choice that can be heard from 60 feet away (DC-5).
description: A variety of tools for making and repairing small mechanisms.

name: Weaver's Tools
utilize: Mend a tear in clothing (DC 5)
sew a Tiny design (DC 5)
Reinforce light armor or clothing to grant a temporary +1 bonus to AC for 1 hour (DC 20)
description: Tools for weaving fabric and creating textiles.

name: Woodcarver's Tools
utilize: Carve a pattern in wood (DC 10)
Identify a tree and its wood quality (DC 10)
description: Tools for shaping and carving wood.

name: Disguise Kit
utilize: Apply makeup to look older, look wounded, etc (DC 10)
Identify whether a creature is disguised (DC 10)
description: A collection of cosmetics, hair dye, and small props for creating disguises.

name: Herbalism Kit
utilize: Identify a plant (DC 5)
Create a soothing balm that grants advantage on saving throws against disease and poison for 1 hour (DC 15)
Prepare herbs to mask a scent (DC 10)
description: A collection of tools and ingredients for identifying and using herbs.

name: Navigator's Tools
utilize: Determine position from stars and environment (DC 15)
Determine the current weather patterns (DC 10)
Estimate travel time to a known location (DC 10)
description: Instruments used for navigation, especially at sea.

name: Poisoner's Kit
utilize: Detect a poisoned object (DC 10)
Safely extract a mild venom from a poisonous creature (DC 20)
description: Equipment and ingredients for creating poisons.

name: Thieves' Tools
utilize: Pick a simple lock (DC 10)
disarm a simple trap (DC 10)
Jam a simple lock temporarily (DC 10)
description: A set of specialized tools used for picking locks and disarming traps.

name: Dice
utilize: You can reroll a single roll in the next 1 minute (DC 15)
Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10)
Cheat secretly for a more positive outcome (DC 10)
Win the game (DC 20)
description: A set of dice used for various games of chance. (Suggestion: Roll 4d6. Keep them hidden. 2 rounds of betting.)

name: Dragonchess
utilize: Increase your focus, granting +1 to your initiative for 10 minutes (DC 15)
Gain insight about your opponents next move (DC 15)
Win the game (DC 20)
description: A complex strategy game played on a multi-tiered board. (Suggestion: Use a chess puzzle)

name: Playing Cards
utilize: You have advantage on Charisma (deception) rolls for 1 minute (DC 15)
Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10)
Cheat secretly for a more positive outcome (DC 10)
Win the game (DC 20)
description: A deck of cards used for various games. (Suggestion: Each player draws a card or rolls a d10. Can tell either a lie or the truth about your card number. You get that many points unless you are called out on a lie. A player loses 7 points for wrongly calling a bluff.)

name: Three-dragon Ante
utilize: You have advantage on Wisdom (insight) rolls for 1 minute (DC 15)
Discern whether someone is cheating (DC 10)
Cheat secretly for a more positive outcome (DC 10)
Win the game (DC 20)
description: A popular card game involving betting and dragon imagery. (Suggestion: Each player draws 6 cards or rolls 6d10 secretly. Reveal 3 and line them in a single row. After everyone reveals, arrange the remaining 3 behind each card in the first row, still hidden, creating 3 columns of 2. Simultaneously, reveal the hidden row. Whoever has the highest total for the most columns wins. If it's a tie, the tied players play another round until there is a winner.

Play a known tune (DC 10)
improvise a song (DC 15)
